Recycling Sorting System: Add compartments within the trash can to separate different types of recyclables, making it easier for users to dispose of their waste properly.
Odor Control: Incorporate an odor-absorbing filter that can be replaced periodically to keep the trash can smelling fresh.
Aesthetic Appeal: Design the trash can with a visually appealing exterior that can blend seamlessly with the surrounding decor, making it less obtrusive in public spaces.
Composting System: Integrate a composting system that breaks down organic waste into nutrient-rich soil, reducing waste sent to landfills and promoting a more sustainable lifestyle.
Motion-activated Light: Install a motion-activated light that illuminates the trash can at night, improving visibility and safety.
